title: My name is hideous
body:
I need some serious help, I fucked up so bad guys. I just got enough IP to purchase a name change.

and I did the one thing you can fuck up in a name change. 

I misspelled my goddamn name. 

I've played this game since fucking season 1 and never changed names till now, PLEASE GOD HELP ME
IT SHOULD BE POOPERGEIST, BUT IM DUMB AND NOW ITS POOPERGIEST. PLEASE HELP, I NEED EVERYONES UPVOTES! 
This is horrible. **MY BEST SUBJECT IN SCHOOL WAS ENGLISH FOR CHRISTS SAKE.**

please send love and pray that riot games is merciful and helps my wayward soul.

replies.body: I FUCKIGN LOVE YOU RIOT, THANK YOU SO MUCH, I WILL FOREVER PLAY AND SWEAR BY THIS GAME YOUVE CREATED

Looks like it wasn't a Knight, but rather a Phatmage in shining armor that came to your rescue already xD!

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
There should be a help and support section just for this problem.
